titleStmt.title: To EDWARD DE GEX,Edward Peter De Gex (1812-79; sometimes Dé Gex), solicitor, of Austen and De Gex; resident at 44 Hunter Street, Brunswick Square. Brother of John De Gex (1809-87), barrister: see Pilgrim Letters 2, p. 423n. Edward had dealt with Letitia Austin’s affairs after the death of her husband (Pilgrim Letters 9, p.550 & nn). [13 JUNE 1865]
